parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Comma seperated list of applications to subscribe to.

parameters.name: Upgrade
parameters.description: RFC6455 header for upgrading a connection to a websocket.

Event.description: Asynchronous events from Asterisk. The non-required fields of this object are mutually exclusive.

application.description: Name of the application receiving the event.

ApplicationReplaced.description: Notification that another WebSocket has taken over for an application.
ApplicationReplaced.notes: An application may only be subscribed to by a single WebSocket at a time. If multiple WebSockets attempt to subscribe to the same application, the newer WebSocket wins, and the older one receives this event.

ChannelCreated.description: Notification that a channel has been created.

ChannelSnapshot.description: Some part of channel state changed.

ChannelDestroyed.description: Notification that a channel has been destroyed.

cause.description: Integer representation of the cause of the hangup

cause_txt.description: Text representation of the cause of the hangup

ChannelStateChange.description: Notification of a channel's state change.

ChannelDtmfReceived.notes: This event is sent when the DTMF ends. There is no notification about the start of DTMF

channel.description: The channel on which DTMF was received

ChannelDialplan.description: Channel changed location in the dialplan.

application.description: The application that the channel is currently in.

application_data.description: The data that was passed to the application when it was invoked.

channel.description: The channel that changed dialplan location.

caller_presentation.description: The integer representation of the Caller Presentation value.

caller_presentation_txt.description: The text representation of the Caller Presentation value.

channel.description: The channel that changed Caller ID.

ChannelUserevent.description: User-generated event with additional user-defined fields in the object.

eventname.description: The name of the user event.

channel.description: The channel that signaled the user event.

ChannelHangupRequest.description: A hangup was requested on the channel.

cause.description: Integer representation of the cause of the hangup.

soft.description: Whether the hangup request was a soft hangup request.

channel.description: The channel on which the hangup was requested.

value.description: The new value of the variable.

channel.description: The channel on which the variable was set.

StasisEnd.description: Notification that a channel has left a Stasis appliction.

StasisStart.description: Notification that a channel has entered a Stasis appliction.
